meanings.sent1: I will prepackage the snacks for the picnic tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to prepackage the products to save time.
meanings.sent3: Why did the squirrel prepackage all the nuts in tiny bags?
meanings.sent4: She prepackages her thoughts before speaking, ensuring clarity.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret to efficiency is to prepackage all the ingredients before cooking.

meanings.sent1: The prepackaged meals are convenient for busy families.
meanings.sent2: I prefer to buy prepackaged snacks for my road trips.
meanings.sent3: The prepackaged gift looked like a surprise waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: The prepackaged software saved them hours of work.
